source: Compiled from repair community knowledge, iFixit, Rossmann Group, repair.wiki

charging_ics.name: CP3200C1H3
charging_ics.notes: TI battery charger for iPhone Air

power_ics.name: 343S00826
power_ics.notes: Расположен на обратной стороне A19 Pro CPU, требует осторожного reballing

audio_ics.name: 338S00105
symptoms_when_faulty: Loop disease (reboot loop when audio used)

audio_ics.name: 338S00537
repair_tips: Check all audio lines to CPU
Verify speaker and mic connections first

baseband_ics.name: MDM9655 (Qualcomm)
baseband_ics.notes: Two variants exist: Qualcomm and Intel

diagnostics.short_check: Check PP_3V1_LDO10 for short under BB_CPU

baseband_ics.name: Apple C1X
baseband_ics.notes: Первый 5G модем Apple. Не поддерживает mmWave (планируется в C2 2026)

baseband_ics.name: APL1114/337S01030 (C1X)
baseband_ics.notes: Apple's second-gen in-house 5G modem - 2x faster than C1, 30% more efficient

baseband_ics.name: APL1088/338S01150
baseband_ics.notes: Apple RF transceiver for C1X modem

baseband_ics.name: Qualcomm SDX80
baseband_ics.notes: Qualcomm X80 modem for non-Air iPhone 17 models

nand_ics.name: Kioxia/Sandisk NAND
nand_ics.notes: Requires NAND programmer for data recovery. SN/ECID must match.

nand_ics.name: SK Hynix NAND
nand_ics.notes: Newer NAND is paired with CPU, limited repair options

nand_ics.name: Apple NAND (3D TLC)
repair_tips: NAND is soldered to CPU in newer models
Data recovery may be possible before replacement

wifi_bt_ics.name: 339S00912
repair_tips: May need Apple calibration for full functionality

wifi_bt_ics.name: Apple N1
wifi_bt_ics.notes: Первый WiFi чип Apple, заменяет Broadcom

wifi_bt_ics.name: 339S01464
repair_tips: Use JC WiFi programmer for activation

wifi_bt_ics.name: 339M00400 (N1 WiFi 7)
wifi_bt_ics.notes: Contains Apple N1 chip - WiFi 7 (802.11be), Bluetooth 6, Thread networking

wifi_bt_ics.name: 339M00384 (U2 UWB)
wifi_bt_ics.notes: Contains Apple U2 - second-gen Ultra Wideband chip

biometric_ics.name: STM32L476
biometric_ics.notes: Paired to CPU, cannot be replaced without losing function

biometric_ics.name: Dot Projector Driver
biometric_ics.notes: Paired to logic board. Apple Self Service allows re-pairing on newer models
